topic.title: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE (PATHOLOGY REPORT AUTHORISED BY)
topic.shortdesc: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE (PATHOLOGY REPORT AUTHORISED BY) is the code which identifies the PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION BODY of the CARE PROFESSIONAL who authorised the pathology report.
